programsA.title: MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION
programsA.subtitle: Online programs with videos
programsA.text: Unlimited access to prenatal and postnatal programs, with guided videos and personalized advice every week.

programsA.title: ONE-TO-ONE SESSIONS
programsA.subtitle: In-person or via Zoom
programsA.text: A personalized 1-hour session adapted to your stage of maternity with attentive follow-up and tailored advice.

programsA.title: GROUP CLASSES
programsA.subtitle: In groups of up to 8 people.
programsA.text: 1-hour classes in small groups for quality support, based on the Gasquet method.

programsB.title: PRENATAL ASSESSMENT
programsB.subtitle: Your body evolves every day, bringing many questions.
programsB.text: Take a few minutes to complete this prenatal assessment. It’s the first step to finding serenity and confidence in yourself. This moment is yours, a break to listen to your body and emotions.
programsB.text1: Click the button below, and let’s start this beautiful journey together now.

programsB.title: POSTNATAL ASSESSMENT
programsB.subtitle: After baby arrives, it's time to think about yourself.
programsB.text: Take a few minutes to complete this postnatal assessment. It’s the first step to rediscover yourself and feel good in your body and mind.
programsB.text1: Click the button below and let’s start this beautiful recovery together.

programsB.title: I WANT TO GET BACK IN SHAPE
programsB.subtitle: Ready to take control of your well-being?
programsB.text: Take a few minutes to complete this global assessment. It’s the first step to getting back in shape and reaching your goals.
programsB.text1: Click the button below and let’s start this beautiful journey together.
